item.title: My chat tab-autocompletion mod for 1.0.0
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:4, topic:425702”][quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=528363.msg3853586#msg3853586 date=1324204005]
I was watching when you were talking about this on the IRC, I have no idea how MC modifications actually work but a cool idea would be to add an ingame IRC system, or some form of clan chat. This would prove quite a popular modification in PVP servers due to there being no real way apart from PM to privately communicate between teams ingame (and PM is a slow system anyway).

e.g /join #clanname potentialpasswordhere
[/quote]

PM isn’t slow, at least with the plugins we have, all you have to do to reply is type /r in front of your message.[/quote]

PM is slow when in some sort of urgent situation, and on a bad computer the /r can not always go through sometimes making you look like a bit of an idiot especially if you’re in a PVP situation.

It’s also possible to intercept PMs by sending a message when you feel they’re about to reply so it goes to you.

Read full topic

item.title: My chat tab-autocompletion mod for 1.0.0
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

PM isn't slow, at least with the plugins we have, all you have to do to reply is type /r in front of your message.

I was not aware of this :o Nice to know lol

item.title: My chat tab-autocompletion mod for 1.0.0
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

This looks like an awesome plugin, I miss tab-autocompletion too in minecraft.

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:2, topic:425702”]I was watching when you were talking about this on the IRC, I have no idea how MC modifications actually work but a cool idea would be to add an ingame IRC system, or some form of clan chat. This would prove quite a popular modification in PVP servers due to there being no real way apart from PM to privately communicate between teams ingame (and PM is a slow system anyway).

e.g /join #clanname potentialpasswordhere[/quote]

PM isn’t slow, at least with the plugins we have, all you have to do to reply is type /r in front of your message.

Read full topic
